article.title: Rockwell Collins to Modify and Upgrade E-2C Trainers
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Rockwell Collins Simulation & Training Solutions Limited Liability Corporation, Cedar Rapids, Iowa, is being awarded a $10,462,924 modification to a previously awarded firm-fixed-price contract to exercise options for software modifications and trainer obsolescence upgrades for the E-2C aircraft's weapon systems trainers and simulated maintenance trainer as the aircraft moves into sunset/sundown. The Naval Air Warfare Center Training Systems Division, Orlando, Florida, is the contracting activity.
